attributes.action: stop Jonathon Ross presenting Comic Relief 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that, following Jonathon Ross' behaviour on Radio 2 with regard to Andrew Sachs, it is inappropriate for Mr Ross to present the charity telethon this year

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
